summary: This is an email chain from July 12, 2019, forwarding a draft response to Jeffrey Epstein's bail release request. It involves attorneys from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Public Corruption Unit discussing revisions to the legal document.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the bail release request that the drafted legal response is addressing.

events.title: Drafting of Response to Epstein Bail Request
events.description: Attorneys from the U.S. Attorney's Office revise and discuss a draft response to Jeffrey Epstein's request for bail release.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from July 12, 2019, concerning Jeffrey Epstein's case.
It shows the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively drafting a response to oppose Epstein's bail release request.
The correspondence involves the Public Corruption Unit of the SDNY.
Two draft versions of the legal response are attached: a clean version and one with tracked changes.
A specific question about a 'trust account' required more information from the legal team to address.
